headers.access-control-expose-headers: ETag, Link, Location, Retry-After, X-GitHub-OTP, X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Used, X-RateLimit-Resource, X-RateLimit-Reset, X-OAuth-Scopes, X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes, X-Poll-Interval, X-GitHub-Media-Type, X-GitHub-SSO, X-GitHub-Request-Id, Deprecation, Sunset

issueOrPullRequest.body:
This pull request updates the contributor guide and Codex skills to match the latest JS repository guidance.
- Renames the verification skill to code-change-verification and updates scripts/messages accordingly.
- Adds openai-knowledge for pulling authoritative OpenAI docs via MCP.
- Expands AGENTS.md with mandatory skill usage, workflow details, and PR handoff expectations (including draft PR summary requirements).
- Fixes snapshot creation command documentation.
issueOrPullRequest.title: docs: align contributor guide and skills with JS updates
